entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:04 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this morning and ending this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
